title: Points for Orb of Order
body:
Was it even possible to get enough points to make an orb of order by completing missions without paying for the bonus missions?
If not, that's pretty disappointing if I've missed out by 20 points.

replies.body: 3 orbs and the third orb gave 700 tokens (5 more orbs).  I got 8 orbs without paying a cent.
I've gotten 3 orbs so far without paying a cent. I just did every free mission available so far (and gotten lucky with bonus points from the drops).
It was possible to make 2 Orbs for free if you played every day. The orbs themselves sometimes gave out extra tokens, so you could've gotten up to 3 or 4, depending on your luck.
